attract.heading: Discovering Judith and Holofernes
attract.touch_to_begin: TOUCH TO BEGIN | TOCAR PARA COMENZAR

text_array: Let's discover more about Judith and Holofernes, created by Kehinde Wiley. This painting is considered one of the most challenging works in the NCMA‚Äôs collection.

Many people judge the painting immediately without taking time to understand the story behind it. In this video you‚Äôll get the background on this work of art and hear about the biblical story that inspired it.
You‚Äôll also hear from a tour guide at the NCMA and her response to how she thinks the artist has directly addressed in this painting ongoing issues of inequality, power, and oppression.

form.response_intro: Now that you have listened to various stories and viewpoints about the painting, consider how your perspective may have shifted.
form.response_question: Interpretation of a work of art can change over time and is often impacted by the viewer‚Äôs personal experiences and current events. What is your response to this painting today?
